title: cmd/go: fix local import in directories with spaces
body:
C:\Documents and Settings\brainman\go\test>go run fixedbugs\bug424.go
# command-line-arguments
fixedbugs\bug424.go:14: import path contains space character: "_/C_/Documents and
Settings/brainman/go/test/fixedbugs/bug424.dir"

C:\Documents and Settings\brainman\go\test>hg id
65ab6c67373a+ tip
